alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 12:19AM CDT until April 30 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Havana, or 8 miles north of Caney, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Cherryvale, Caney, Dearing, Mound Valley, Tyro, Liberty, Havana, Bolton, Angola, Elk City Lake, Elk City State Park, Independence Airport, Coffeyville Airport and Big Hill Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
